fittingmethod.title: Fitting method
fittingmethod.description: Overwrite `fittingmethod` parameter to select a different method

largegridstepratio.title: Large grid step ratio
largegridstepratio.description: Multiplicative factor of the redshift step size for the first pass: firstpassz step = step * largegridstepratio. To use finegrid step, set largegridstep to 0 or 1

tplratio_ismfit.title: Wether to activate ISM extinction fit

multiplecontinuumfit_disable.title: Wether to use only the best continuum template
multiplecontinuumfit_disable.description: Wether to overwrite the `continuumfit.count` parameter to keep only the best continuum template (true=> sets `continuumfit.count` to 1)
